title: The Emperor’s Terminally-ill Youngest Daughter is Being Taken Care Of - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Child Abuse   Death   Depression   Doting Older Siblings   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Near-Death Experience   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sickly Characters   Terminal Illness   Weak to Strong
author: 연제이
description:
I was a princess who lived in the back of the palace, as no one cared about my health.

Damn it.

I felt pain the more I moved and the blood pressure would drop if I expressed excitement.

I was on my deathbed.

Until one day the Emperor visited me.

“You will die soon.”

“Yes, so … Koh … cough.”

He had no interest in me.

I had an idea to call him when the blood suddenly came out of my mouth. The emperor left a surprise, and my life began to change since that day.>
